title: In-Memory CRUD
description: Implement CRUD operations on an in-memory data store to understand the repository pattern concepts.
instructions: Create a TodoStore class with create(title), readAll(), update(id, title), and delete(id) methods. Demonstrate all four operations.

hints.text: Use a data class Todo(val id: Int, var title: String)
Keep a MutableList<Todo> and an auto-incrementing ID counter
Use find { it.id == id } to locate items by ID

commonMistakes.correction: Use a private var nextId that increments on each create
Use removeAll or find the item first, then remove

commonMistakes.mistake: Not handling missing IDs in update/delete
commonMistakes.correction: Return Boolean to indicate success or failure
